title: The Curse of the Sunken Chest
starting_description: You are a notorious buccaneer, stranded on a forgotten isle. Legend speaks of Captain Blackheart's cursed treasure, locked within a barnacle-encrusted chest. Three peculiar mechanisms bar your way to riches untold... or doom.

paths.description: A brass dial with ancient symbols, reminiscent of a ship's compass, is the first impediment. A weathered inscription warns: 'Navigate the stars to the Pirate's Code, then mark the colour of the distant isle.'
paths.hint: How many articles were in the most infamous Pirate's Code? // What color often signifies lush land on a mariner's chart?
paths.death_text: A treacherous squall of static electricity engulfs the dial, freezing it forever. The compass needle points to an endless, watery grave. The treasure is lost.

paths.description: The second lock is a dark, glassy orb, pulsating faintly. It feels alive, sensitive to touch and shadow. A chilling whisper seems to emanate from it: 'Blind the beast, then give it a fright!'
paths.hint: To conceal its sight, cast a shadow upon its eye. // A sudden tremor will break its eerie calm.
paths.death_text: The orb shatters, releasing a black, inky cloud that envelops the chest, cursing it to the abyssal depths. The treasure is lost to the darkness.

paths.description: The final contraption is a small, wooden panel with an item slot and a series of colored buttons. A crude drawing of a treasure chest is etched near a yellow button. An old sea shanty's verse is carved below: 'What brings forth fortune from the depths, then signals greed's desire?'
paths.hint: To unlock buried wealth, what ancient tool must you present? // What gleaming hue represents the ultimate pirate's prize?
paths.death_text: A hidden mechanism snaps, sending a torrent of salt water into the chest, ruining all within. The treasure is lost to the sea's unforgiving embrace.
